ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lugubrious Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: I use Lament very successfully, but my item-buffed Cha is 122 without my stein.  I have heard other bards on E ci complain that it doesn t work so it may be a
ygData.messageBody:
I use Lament very successfully, but my item-buffed Cha is 122 without my
stein. I have heard other bards on E'ci complain that it doesn't work so it
may be a new problem. I used to get a fair number of resists, but very few
resist and notice. It wouldn't get sad sometimes, but the target hardly ever
got angry.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 2:38 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Lugubrious Lament


From: Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...>

I've had a lot of trouble using Lugubrious Lament
effectively. Maybe part of the problem is that I also
play a druid and Harmony seems far superior to me, not
only because it's AOE, but because it is resisted so
seldom.

I've heard from some bards that this is a great song,
from others that it's useless.

My charisma is currently 91 and I'm 14th lvl.

Also, would someone have a better chance of using
Lament holding a crude stein instead of a lute? I
have a line on one of these but since I can't hold one
and use an instrument at the same time, don't want to
spend the money if it won't work.

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
